ALABAMA AWAITS: In the GOP Senate runoff between KATIE BRITT and Rep. MO BROOKS this month, Trump is considering weighing in to pick a winner, but he's torn between the two, Natalie Allison reports this morning.

WHY GUN RESTRICTIONS NEVER PASS: Rep. CHRIS JACOBS (R-N.Y.) abruptly dropped his reelection bid Friday, only a week after abandoning party orthodoxy to back new limits on guns, including an assault weapons ban.
